summary: This document is a daily lieutenant's log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, NY, covering three shifts on August 9, 2019. It details routine operations, inmate counts, movements, and statuses, including several inmates on suicide watch or psychological observation. The log shows standard facility procedures and inmate management for that day.

persons.name: Bright
persons.context: Inmate Bright (register number Y76309-054) is listed as being on suicide watch with an inmate companion during the morning watch shift.

persons.name: Gentile
persons.role: Inmate on Suicide Watch / Psychological Observation
persons.context: Inmate Gentile (register number 171230-054 / 071230-054) is listed on suicide watch during the morning shift and on psychological observation during the day and evening shifts, each time with an inmate companion.

persons.name: Ramos
persons.context: Inmate Ramos (register number 085428-054 / 1185428-054) is listed as pending bed space in SHU during the morning shift and on psychological observation with an inmate companion during the day and evening shifts.

persons.name: Fernandez
persons.context: Inmate Fernandez (register number 86824-054) is placed on a dry cell with staff watch in R&D during the day shift and remains there into the evening shift.

persons.name: Jones
persons.context: Inmate Jones (register numbers 86627-054 and 06178-104) is mentioned in relation to a hospital trip and a treaty transfer.

persons.name: Cuyler
persons.context: Inmate Cuyler (register number 89936-053) is transferred from ES to GCT REL.

persons.context: Inmate Ramirez (register number 81219-054) is involved in a FT REL (full-term release).

events.title: Daily Operations at MCC New York
events.description: Routine correctional facility operations including inmate counts, status checks (suicide watch, psychological observation), inmate transfers, and system checks (fire alarms, body alarms).

events.title: Inmate Bright Removed from Suicide Watch
events.description: Inmate Bright is taken off suicide watch at 1:10 PM during the day shift.

events.title: Inmate Jones Treaty Transfer
events.description: Inmate Jones (register #06178-104) is transferred out via treaty transfer at 2:41 PM during the day shift.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The log documents standard operational procedures at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on August 9, 2019, with no direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein or any events related to his case.
Several inmates (Bright, Gentile, Ramos, Felix, Williams) were on suicide watch or psychological observation, indicating heightened monitoring for at-risk individuals.
The facility experienced technical issues, including an inoperable fire alarm/pump system and a malfunctioning public address system, which prevented standard PREA announcements.
Inmate movements and counts were meticulously recorded throughout three shifts (Morning, Day, Evening), reflecting routine inmate management.
The document is a standard correctional facility administrative log and contains no evidentiary information pertaining to the Epstein investigation or conspiracy.
